## Conversation that answers the provided questions:
**User:**
I've got a few more questions about Verus. What are some additional capabilities of Verus?

**AI Assistant:**
Verus has several additional capabilities, including on-chain launches of tokens, centralized currencies, and liquidity basket AMMs, as well as on-chain launches and merge mining of independent, connected, interoperable blockchains without programming. It also supports on-chain self-sovereign, provable identities, NFTs, and individual or organizational profiles. This means that Verus can be used for a wide range of applications, from creating and managing digital assets to building complex blockchain-based systems.

**User:**
That sounds pretty powerful. What is the Verus ID and NFT Marketplace, and how does it work?

**AI Assistant:**
The Verus ID and NFT Marketplace is a decentralized platform where users can buy and sell VerusIDs and NFTs directly on the blockchain. Users can advertise their offers to the owner of an ID or NFT, or post their sale publicly for all to see. Transactions are executed in a completely decentralized and peer-to-peer manner, without the need for intermediaries. Payments can be made from transparent or zero-knowledge private addresses, and owners can still share proceeds with value-added agents or other participants. This allows for a secure, transparent, and decentralized marketplace for digital assets.

**User:**
I've also heard about Verus Vault. What is it, and how does it protect funds on a VerusID?

**AI Assistant:**
Verus Vault is a feature that allows users to lock their VerusID, protecting funds from theft even if the private key is compromised. While locked, users cannot spend funds from that identity, but they can still receive funds and stake those funds on the Verus network to earn rewards. To enable Verus Vault capabilities, users must have at least one primary identity and one revocation/recovery ID configured. This means that even if someone gains access to your private key, they won't be able to spend your funds.

**User:**
That sounds like a really useful feature. What are the benefits of using Verus Vault to protect my funds?

**AI Assistant:**
The main benefit of using Verus Vault is that it provides an additional layer of security to protect your funds from theft, even if your private key is compromised. This means that you can have peace of mind knowing that your funds are safe, while still being able to receive funds and participate in the Verus network by staking your funds. It's an extra layer of protection that can give you confidence in the security of your digital assets.
What are some additional capabilities of Verus?

Verus has several additional capabilities, including on-chain launches of tokens, centralized currencies, and liquidity basket AMMs, as well as on-chain launches and merge mining of independent, connected, interoperable blockchains without programming. It also supports on-chain self-sovereign, provable identities, NFTs, and individual or organizational profiles.

### Additional Verus Capabilities
- On-chain Launches of Token, Centralized Currency, and Liquidity Basket AMMs
- On-chain Launches and Merge Mining of Independent, Connected, Interoperable Blockchains without Programming
- On-chain Self Sovereign, Provable Identities, NFTs, and Individual or Organizational Profiles#### Verus ID and NFT Marketplace
Buy and sell VerusIDs on-chain, advertising your offer directly to the owner of an ID or NFT, or posting the sale of your NFT on the worldwide blockchain for all the world to see. Execute transactions in a completely decentralized way. Pay or offer to pay from a transparent or zero-knowledge private address, still auditable by you. Accept payment to either as well, and best of all, execute your transactions directly, peer-to-peer without any intermediary necessary. Don’t worry the on-chain model still makes room for owners to select and share proceeds with value added agents, marketing organizations, or other participants in a new economy of provable digital ownership. It’s the next step in the evolution of VerusID, the most powerful self-sovereign identity and secure storage model for funds in the digital world.#### Verus Vault
With Verus Vault you can now protect funds on a VerusID, even from theft of a private key! If you lock your VerusID with Vault you cannot spend funds from that identity at all until it is again unlocked. While locked, you can still stake those same funds on the Verus network and earn by doing so. Of course, you can also still receive funds.IT IS IMPORTANT TO NOTE THAT ENABLING REVOCATION, RECOVERY, AND ALL VERUS VAULT CAPABILITIES REQUIRE YOU TO HAVE ONE PRIMARY IDENTITY, AND AT LEAST ONE REVOCATION/RECOVERY ID CONFIGURED.
